          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic field orientations around current-carrying solenoid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetisch fangen Sie Lagebestimmungen 
um aktuell-tragendes Solenoid auf</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Orientations de champ magnétique autour de 
solénoïde actuel-portant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Orientações do campo magnético em torno do 
solenóide atual-carregando</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Orientamenti del campo magnetico intorno al 
solenoide corrente-trasportante</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Προσανατολισμοί μαγνητικών πεδίων γύρω από την 
παρών-μεταφορά του σωληνοειδούς</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Orientaciones del campo magnético alrededor del 
solenoide actual-que lleva</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the directions of magnetic fields at areas around a current-carrying solenoid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">drawing compass</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">electric current</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic field orientation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">solenoids</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung stellt dar, daß die Richtungen 
von magnetischem an den Bereichen um ein aktuell-tragendes Solenoid 
auffängt.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre les directions des 
champs magnétiques aux zones autour d'un solénoïde actuel-portant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra os sentidos de campos 
magnéticos em áreas em torno de um solenóide atual-carregando.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra i sensi dei campi 
magnetici alle zone intorno ad un solenoide corrente-trasportante.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τις κατευθύνσεις των 
μαγνητικών πεδίων στις περιοχές γύρω από ένα παρών-φέρνοντας 
σωληνοειδές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra las direcciones de 
campos magnéticos en las áreas alrededor de un solenoide actual-que 
lleva.</string>
          </description>
